DataElement.preferredName: CoPaQ How Much Total Travel Time for Caregiver or Companion for Non-Medical Consultations Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numerical value that represents the total traveled time duration by patient's caregiver for non-medical consultations.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cost for Patients Questionnaire How Much Total Travel Time for Caregiver or Companion for Non-Medical Consultations
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess an individual's expenses as a result of their state of health. It includes questions about out-of-pocket costs, time required for travel or for booking medical services, and loss of income.:A question about how much total travel time an individual's companion experienced while accompanying the individual to non-medical consultations.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Approximately how much time in total (round trip) do you estimate your caregiver or the person accompanying you spent travelling with you to get to and from your non-medical consultations?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Approximately how much time in total (round trip) do you estimate your caregiver or the person accompanying you spent travelling with you to get to and from your non-medical consultations (e.g., massage therapy, chirotherapy, naturopath)?
